Отличная игра! Так понравилась, что уже 6й год играю) и не на одном аккаунте
A classic game that is still played to this day. Unlike CS:GO with a competitive scene, Source thrives on custom gamemodes that throw you back to the glory days of the early 2000's and 2010's.
Отличная игра, хороший онлайн на серверах.

Лучшая игра современности. Номинация: "Как я не попал?" 2018. 
Плюсы и минусы игры:
+ Упрощенная механика стрельбы (чисто чилл).
+ Смешные дядьки на серверах, прямиком с зоны.
+ Скины ставишь свои и играешь в удовольствие.
- Иногда не понимаешь, как ты не попал в стоячего, но попал носкопом в воздухе развернувшись на 360 градусов. 
 [strike] Обзор для ачивки [/strike]
even now years later this game is still one of my favs
好玩，太好玩了，就是老被对面射爆头
Uhh nice game, wasted a lot of time in gun game and zombies uhhh...
Когда вышла Source, я зависал в 1.6. Когда вышла GO - стал зависать в Source. Жду продолжения, надо же на GO взглянуть.
盗版玩到现在正版都 还没有放弃 每天在老玩家玩玩
Still a favorite after all these years
In my opinion still the best Counter-Strike. Sadly almost everyone I enjoyed playing with moved to CSGO when it got released.
Лучшая игра в которой можно найти режим для души
THIS GAME IS DEAD BY NOW

1物理引擎好，特别是你跟一个桶撞上的时候
2子弹落点和溅起的灰尘相准确
3地图明亮，特别是仓库火车站下面那一块，根本不用夜视仪

Addictive....♥♥♥♥ing Addictive......

Kill someone with a P90 - "You're a fuc**** noob!! Noob weapon!!"
Kill someone with a P90 through a smoke - "You're a fuc**** hacker!!"
Kill someone with a AWP - "You're a fuc**** noob!! Noob weapon!!"
Kill someone with a AWP through a door - "You're a fuc**** hacker!!"
In a 1 vs 5 you die - "You're a fuc**** noob!!"
In a 1 vs 5 you win - "You're a fuc**** hacker!!"
Kill someone with a headshot - "Hacker!!"
Get headshoted by someone - "Owned!!" and get teabagged
Kill someone with a grenade - "Luck!!"
Get killed by someone with a grenade - "AHAHAHAHA"
Get teamkilled by someone - "Get out of the way you fuc**** idiot!!"
Accidentally teamkill someone - "You're a fuc**** idiot!!"
Blocked by someone - Dies
Accidentally blocks someone - "Get out the way you fuc**** idiot!!"
Decide to save - "You're a fuc**** coward!!"
Decide not to save - "Save you fuc**** idiot!!"
Kill someone while defending the bomb - "You fuc**** camper!!"
Kill someone while defending the hostages - "You fuc**** camper!!"
Someone dies - The deceased one starts to rage
Your team lose the round - Your team starts to rage
Your team is losing 10-2 - Someone rages quit
Go to the balcony in Italy - "You fuc**** hacker!!"
Worst guy receives a drop - "Are you fuc**** serious!?"
Warm up - Everybody tries to spawn kill
Score is 5-1 in your favor - "This is a T map!"
Score is 1-5 againts you - "This is a CT map!"
Lose the first 2 rounds - Someone asks to get kicked
Last round - Everybody buys Negev
Your team is loosinh and you are in last - Someone vote kicks you
Win a match - All enemy team rages
Lose a match - Yout team rages
Someone's Internet crashes - 30 minutes ban
Your Internet crashes - 7 days ban

css é uma otima opção pra quem nao tem um pc muito bom, eu joguei muito tempo a versao pirata(hehe) num pc fraco que eu tenho, agr q tenho um melhor da pra joga com tudo no high com 60fps cravado kkk,  alem da fisica ser boa , mais ainda prefero o go kkkkk.
pretty good, still better than csgo

Still the best Counter-Strike game. Nostalgia is what brings me back to it every time.
I regret no single second of playtime. If you like CS, you should give it a go.
Experience the game before CS:GO, you won't regret it.
要是能加创意工坊就好了
Jogo muito bom, melhor que o 1.6. Vale a pena comprar quem n tem um PC bom, é muito leve...
очень рекомендую по сравнению с го в которой больше читеров чем игроков
it is a good game.though we often play cs:go ,it always a historic game in cs world.
I got this as a christmas gift from my dad in 2008, thanks dad

Was soll mann zum guten alten CSS schon schreiben, außer dass das früher wie Heute immer noch gut ist. Mann findet zwar nicht mehr so viele Server und Spieler wie früher, aber ne menge Bock macht es immer noch. Und mit einem Kollegen sogar noch viel mehr. :)
jogo mais delicioso na face da terra

Simplemente... la mejor version de Counter Strike que puede existir, desde la mecanica, los mapas, el manejo de las armas y el movimiento del personaje, hasta los bots. Si hubiese una scene competitiva del mismo ya estaria entrenando <3
i love this game =D it's really fun! i also think the environment is really pretty
